title: What Other Say About Microfrontend
summary: In his book, Luca Mezzalira interviewed several industry professionals who are adopting micro-frontends within their organizations to highlight the wide range of applications. This post compiles all of those interviews.

body.raw:
In his book, Luca Mezzalira interviewed several industry professionals who are adopting micro-frontends within their organizations to highlight the wide range of applications. This post compiles all of those interviews.

Nimisha Asthagiri

Cheif Architect

Felipe Guizar

Senior Engineer

Anthony Frehner

Frontend Architect

Joel Denning

Independent Consultant

Zack Jackson

Principle Engineer

Erik Grijzen

Software Engineer

David Leitner

Cofounder of SQUER

Philipp Pracht

Architect at SAP
